attributes.action: stop discrimination against the British National Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British National Party has approx. 13000+ members and approx. 1million+ voters and two elected MEP's. Would the government recognise the party as the electorate does and end discrimination against it ???

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
